name: Lisi
appearance: Tall, perfumed with saffron and inkroot, rings that change hue with heat. Always framed by a scarf dyed in a gradient no one else can name.
character: Charming, knife-bright, and relentlessly pragmatic about margins.
talents: smells profit in a color blend
keeps three ledgers in her head without a slip
dreams: monopolize night-dye refining from Moonfallen Orchard
seat a color-marshal in Parliament beholden to her
launch an export of gloam dye beyond the delta
secrets: Funds a small cadre to tamper with vote-lamp tints on critical nights
Owns a hidden stake in an independent dyer she publicly denounces
Her signature scarf hides a burn from testing backward-burning moon-resin
